org.red5.io.flv

Class FLVHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.red5.io.flv.FLVHeader

  • public class FLVHeader
extends Object
    FLVHeader parses out the contents of a FLV video file and returns the Header data
    Author:
    The Red5 Project (red5@osflash.org), Dominick Accattato (daccattato@gmail.com), Luke Hubbard, Codegent Ltd (luke@codegent.com), Tiago Jacobs (tiago@imdt.com.br)
    See Also:
    OSFlash (external)
